text: Gabriel-Marie-Joseph-Anselme de Broglie-Revel (21 April 1931 - 8 January 2025) was a French historian and politician. Broglie-Revel was elected to the Académie française in 2001. He replaced Alain Peyrefitte. He was a Knight Commander of the Légion d'honneur. He was a distant relative of the ducs de Broglie. L'Académie française Broglie died in Paris, France on 8 January 2025 at the age of 93.Gabriel de Broglie, historien et académicien, est mort ==References== ==Other websites== * Les Immortels: Gabriel de BROGLIE Category:1931 births Category:2025 deaths Category:French historians Category:Politicians from Île-de-France Category:People from Versailles
title: Gabriel de Broglie
